mapper.sql: STTID, Year, Place, SmCode, SmName, STTax, LaCode
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_subtraveltax (STTID, Year, Place, SmCode, SmName, STTax, LaCode) values (#{sttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_subtraveltax where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_subtraveltax (STTID, Year, Place, SmCode, SmName, STTax, LaCode) values (#{sttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tbl_subtraveltax
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmCode = #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmName = #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STTax = #{sttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STTID = #{sttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
